1.content:
Welcome. Here you will choose what character you will follow. What they encounter will be up to you.

Remember to write a paragraph of detail or more. And if the character you are following gets digested and turned to a turd, continue the story from the predators point of view.
1.title: Welcome to the Pridelands

11.content: Making the good guys into chubby guys. Or just feeding them off to someone else!
11.title: Protagonists

115.content: More protagonists to choose from.
115.title: More

12.content: Going to give the heroes what they deserve or put the villains in their proper place?
12.title: Antagonists

122.content: Are these hyenas finally going to do their job right and snag themselves a meal? Or they gonna fall even shorter and end up churning away?
122.title: One of the Hyenas

1221.content:
Shenzi, queen of the hyenas, walked along the elephant graveyard, alone and away from her "friends" Banzai and Ed, needing a break from the noise the two were able to create and how annoying it was to be around them. She was taking a well-deserved break from the two and trying to find something to satisfy her growing hunger that was becoming well known from the multiple gurgles echoing out from her gut. With the other two not around, it would be easier for Shenzi to track and get something tasty without having to worry about the idiots ruining it like usual.

Shenzi continued to walk, her hunger growing more and more, getting closer to lion territory. She was now finally able to pick up the scent of some animal... what it was coming from the direction of Pride Rock, which was never right. Usually meant a lion or some other large animal was there, but her belly was about to implode on itself. She was so hungry, so with a sigh, she kept moving towards the smell.

With her energy-depleting, she finally got a look at what she smelt before was...
1221.title: The Story of Shenzi

13.content: Supporting characters going to be supporting more weight, or supporting another preds hunger.
13.title: Supporting Characters

info.brief_description: A vore interactive about characters from The Lion King eating each other!
info.description:
BUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPP
The ground rumbles as it seems the lion king has had its lunch

Welcome to the Pridelands! Home of the characters of the movie The Lion King. Except in this universe, these characters have a new fun characteristic about them. They need to fill up their bellies with each other — a fun addition to the classic movie.

RULES:

What you are allowed:
- Oral Vore Only
- Same Size
- Digestion
- Fatal
- Disposal
- Bones
- Sex

What you are NOT allowed:
- No other types of vore other than oral
- Micro (Exception is already small characters like Timon)
- Reformation
- Short Entries, please make them a paragraph of detail or more
- Watersports


Make some fun scenarios!
Maybe Mufasa never came to save Simba and Nala from the hyenas and made them into a couple of snacks.
Or, Scar pushed Mufasa luckily into an open mouth of a gazelle, sending the once king of the Pridelands away in the belly of a herbivore.
The choice is yours!

Anyone is allowed to eat anyone, have fun!!
